:''For the English word ''celebrant'', as a person who celebrates their birthday, please see ''[[ribadyan]]''.''
'''Celebrant''' (translated as '''Silverlode''') was a stream rising in the eastern [[Misty Mountains]] from springs some way below the the [[Mirrormere]] in the [[Dimrill Dale]]. It then ran through [[Lothlórien]] where it was met by the [[Nimrodel (river)|Nimrodel]] river, and emptied into the [[Anduin]].

==History==
In {{TA|2994}}, an army of orcs came up the Silverlode and wiped out the colony of Dwarves dwelling in [[Moria]].<ref>{{FR|Bridge}}</ref>

Around [[November]] {{TA|3018}}, [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]], sent by [[Elrond]] to a secret errand, passed down the Silverlode into a "strange country" and were the last to return to [[Rivendell]], in [[December]].<ref name="south" />

The [[Fellowship of the Ring]] followed this river when they travelled from Moria to Lothlórien.<ref name="south">{{FR|II3}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Celebrant'' is a [[Sindarin]] name, consisting of ''[[celeb]]'' ("silver") + ''[[rant]]'' ("course").<ref name="S">{{S|Elements}}, entries ''[[celeb]]'', ''[[rant]]''</ref>

The element ''lode'' in ''Silverlode'' means "course, water-channel".<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}, p. 775</ref>

These names were also a translation of '''''[[Kibil-nâla]]''''' in [[Khuzdul]], the language of [[Dwarves]]. An earlier name is also given as ''Zigilnâd''.<ref>{{HM|PM}}, p. 279</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
On the [[The First Map of The Lord of the Rings]], the river was named "Blackroot", then "Redway"<ref>{{TI|First}}, p. 296</ref>. The two names were strucked out on the map.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
===Celebrant in adaptations===
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="250px" heights="150px">
File:The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring - Silverlode Banks.jpg|The Silverlode Banks in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Celebrant.jpg|Celebrant in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''
</gallery>
'''2008: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Celebrant is called "'''Kibil-nâla'''" by the Dwarves. During its flow through [[Lothlórien]], the river is covered in golden [[mallorn]] leaves.
